mapper.select: SELECT message_content messageContent, customer_no customerNo, employee_no employeeNo FROM chat_message WHERE chat_room_no = #{chatRoomNo}
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN true ELSE false END AS result FROM chat_room WHERE customer_no = #{customerNo}
SELECT chat_room_no FROM chat_room cr INNER JOIN customer c ON c.customer_no = cr.customer_no WHERE c.customer_no=#{customerNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message( chat_room_no, customer_no, employee_no, message_content ) VALUES ( #{chatRoomNo}, #{customerNo}, #{employeeNo}, #{messageContent} )
